oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of digestate from Swedish biogas production in organic agriculture – possibilities for efficient plant nutrient recycling
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Salomon, Eva
Wivstad, Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have conducted an extensive review of current knowledge and experiences regarding the possibilities for use of digestate from biogas production on organic farms in Sweden to improve plant nutrient recycling. The main findings of this review are presented below.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Salomon, Eva and Wivstad, Maria (2014) Use of digestate from Swedish biogas production in organic agriculture – possibilities for efficient plant nutrient recycling. In: Rahmann, G. and Aksoy, U. (Eds.) Building Organic Bridges, Johann Heinrich von Thünen-Institut, Braunschweig, Germany, 4, Thuenen Report, no. 20, pp. 1003-1006.
